slideInfo.hText: TOPIC: Most parties benefit from multinational corporations. (defend, challenge, qualify)
slideInfo.qText:
$ money, funding, jobs

Safety, health

Environment

Ethics

International Impact

Technology

Time
slideInfo.correctText:
Sample arguments based on $ SEE ITT issues:
$—Multinationals pay low wages in developing countries.
S—Safety regulations often do not exist in developing countries.
E—Multinationals often pollute the environment.
E—Unethical low wages are counterbalanced by offering available jobs.
I—Multinationals lead to interdependence and the U.S. dollar as
the global currency.
T—Technology offered by multinationals can create the
middle class.
T—Large unskilled workforces do not save time in manufacturing.
